actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study for the establishment of certain bicycle trails.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior, the Secretary of Agriculture, and the Secretary of Transportation to conduct studies for the purpose of determining the feasibility and desirability of establishing specified bicycle trails.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study for the establishment of certain bicycle trails.
